EntryName	HDDC2_HUMAN
ProteinName	5'-deoxynucleotidase HDDC2 (EC 3.1.3.89) (HD domain-containing protein 2) (Hepatitis C virus NS5A-transactivated protein 2) (HCV NS5A-transactivated protein 2)
GeneName	HDDC2 C6orf74 NS5ATP2 CGI-130
Length	204
Function	Catalyzes the dephosphorylation of the nucleoside 5'-monophosphates deoxyadenosine monophosphate (dAMP), deoxycytidine monophosphate (dCMP), deoxyguanosine monophosphate (dGMP) and deoxythymidine monophosphate (dTMP).
